titleStmt.title: A relation of the victory of Elvas obtained over the Spaniard, by the Army of the high and mighty Prince Alfonso the sixth King of Portugal, upon the 14th of January, 1659.

notesStmt.note: "Translated out of the original Portugues by an English gentleman."
Imperfect: pages cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
